entry.title: Introducing Surya, a new heliophysics foundation model
entry.summary: IBM and NASA open-source a new AI foundation model for the Sun that could change how we look at solar flares.

entry.title: Towards a generative future for computing
entry.summary: IBM is exploring a future where generative AI isn’t limited to what’s in the prompt window.

entry.title: Register for the new Qiskit v2.X developer certification | IBM Quantum Computing Blog
entry.summary: Updated Qiskit developer certification exam tests your ability to perform essential quantum computing tasks with the latest version of Qiskit.

entry.title: IBM researchers win prestigious European grants
entry.summary: Ghazi Sarwat Syed and Gregor Seiler add to IBM Research’s strong history with European Research Council grants.

entry.title: Ado: The accelerated discovery orchestrator
entry.summary: The new platform for computational experiments at scale.

entry.title: IBM further strengthens Granite for enterprise deployment with HackerOne
entry.summary: IBM is partnering with HackerOne to offer a bug bounty program for Granite, with up to $100,000 in bounty payouts available. The objective is to identify successful jailbreaks of Granite models deployed in enterprise-like settings with guardrails enabled, as businesses look to scale their AI workflows.

entry.title: Can AI generate truly novel algorithms?
entry.summary: A decades-old approach to measuring algorithmic complexity could provide a window into better understanding how AI systems compute.

entry.title: Updates on the IBM Quantum Credits program | IBM Quantum Computing Blog
entry.summary: Apply today for free access to cutting-edge IBM quantum capabilities

entry.title: IBM’s AI Hardware Center is building tomorrow’s processors
entry.summary: A look inside the group developing full-stack solutions to AI’s unique computational requirements.

entry.title: IBM’s Wei Sun is an expert at navigating life’s trade-offs
entry.summary: Her research focuses on applying operations research to real-world problems. We spoke to her about OR, AI, and what’s next.
